instructions: Image titled Download Music from Instagram Step 1 1 Open the Instagram app on your phone or tablet. The Instagram icon looks like a white camera icon in a pink-and-orange square. You can find it on your home screen, in an app folder or on the Apps tray. Alternatively, you can open Instagram in any desktop or mobile internet browser. Image titled Download Music from Instagram Step 2 2 Find the video you want to download as music. You can download music from any video from your own profile or another user's profile. Make sure the video is in a public profile. You cannot download from private accounts. Image titled Download Music from Instagram Step 3 3 Tap the three-dot icon on the top-right of the post. This will open your options in a pop-up window. Image titled Download Music from Instagram Step 4 4 Tap on the pop-up menu. This will copy the selected video's direct link to your clipboard. You can now use this link to download the video's music. Alternatively, you can open an individual post in your browser, and copy the link from your browser's address bar. Advertisement
